---
title: Materials
---

Each session includes slides and exercises.
The slides for each session can be accessed using the links in the sidebar.
You can download the exercises as an R project by running:

```{.r}
usethis::use_course("measr-workshop/stancon2023-exercises")
```

To make sure you can run the exercises, following the installation instructions on the [prework](prework.qmd) page.
